Tag_Youmay.description: a timed side quest | [[Knives in the Dark]], one of the main quests of the DLC ''The Legacy of the First Blade''

MemoryInfobox.name: Knife in the Dark
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Spartan 'krypteia' - elite ambush fighters, to hear them tell it - worked to identify vulnerable Athens|Athenian Commanders and camps.'

General_Description: '''Knife in the Dark''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra came across one of the [[Sparta]]n ''[[Krypteia]]'', who asked for her help with the nearby [[Athens|Athenians]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
